doc:
Charles Gray (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Gray_(actor) 0 Charles Gray (29 August 1928 – 7 March 2000) was an English actor who was well known for roles including the arch-villain Blofeld in the James Bond film Diamonds Are Forever, Dikko Henderson in a previous Bond film You Only Live Twice, Sherlock Holmes's brother Mycroft Holmes in The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes and as the Criminologist in The Rocky Horror Picture Show in 1975. Charles_Gray ( 29_August_1928 – 7_March_2000 ) was an_English_actor who was_well_known for roles including the_arch-villain Blofeld in the_James_Bond_film_Diamonds Are Forever , Dikko_Henderson in a_previous_Bond_film You Only Live Twice , Sherlock_Holmes 's_brother_Mycroft_Holmes in The_Adventures of Sherlock_Holmes and as the_Criminologist in The_Rocky_Horror_Picture_Show in 1975 .
